text: There are authors who fail majestically, says Luder. They're like a transatlantic that's gonna sting in a storm, with all its lights on, between the howling of the sirens. Others, on the other hand, are like the guy drowning in a muddy pond, unseen, clinging to the handle of a rotten broom. Finished by Luder, 1989
title: Dichos de Luder 12
author: Julio Ramón Ribeyro
